Summary: Blue Crescent shaped moon with bit below m42 west mids
trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Birmingham
There were no other sightings in Birmingham on or around May 21st 2010
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting DetailsWas driving down the M42 around 1.25pm Uk time and over a bridge there was the best way to describe it was a bright blue Crescent shaped moon with a bit below like a teardrop or tube at first I thought it was a ballon but as I drove closer it was not moving its was in a fixed hover or moved very little. It was hovering over a bridge and must have been seen by other people It was brilliant blue in colour I first seen it from about 1000 yards away hovering about 25-35ft above a small motorway bridge between junction 3 and 3a and it did not seem to move it looked like a hard object and sharp i.e it wasn't flapping or rounded almost looked 2d It was hard to look at it because of been on a busy motorway but I can't understand it i mean if it was a ballon it should go up or flap about but didn't move or appear to wasn't very big probs about 4ft tall in all and 1.5-2ft feet wide After going to the airport I came back the same way and there was no sign of it must have been around 20-30mins later which throws out the idea of it been for advertising I really don't have any ideas to what it could be love to hear if anyone does or seen it too please have a look at the pic its only rough but u get the idea.
